org.resthub.jpa

Class JpaHandlerExceptionResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.servlet.handler.AbstractHandlerExceptionResolver
      • org.resthub.jpa.JpaHandlerExceptionResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.core.Ordered, org.springframework.web.servlet.HandlerExceptionResolver

    @Named(value="jpaHandlerExceptionResolver")
public class JpaHandlerExceptionResolver
extends org.springframework.web.servlet.handler.AbstractHandlerExceptionResolver
    Spring MVC exception resolver user to map JPA related exception to HTTP error codes. Spring MVC is an optional dependency, it will be used only if already imported by your application.

    • Field Summary
